news.title: v3.4 Update Complete
news.info:
I'm kicking off this year by returning from a FD slumber and meeting many of the popular demands for this file. This is the biggest upgrade to this file yet. Here are the following bug fixes and upgrades:
  • Upgraded Scrolling Gallery to have large image displays
  • Upgraded Scrolling Gallery to have large video displays
  • Upgraded Traditional Gallery to have large video displays
  • Allow multiple animation configurations in config.xml So you can have more than just the slide effect
  • Ability to have the main & sub navigation open external links
  • Created a new module - MP3 Player
  • Fixed scrollbar bug in news module
  • Added thumbnails to background image selections

news.title: Added a new module - MP3 Player
news.info: I've just finished up my new module for this template. It's actually the first MP3 Player that I've made. It's controlled with XML that lets you add an unlimited number of tracks and specify a background for the content bg.

news.title: XML Portfolio Template v3 Updates
news.info:
A great number of improvements and additions have been made to my XML Portfolio Template (v3). This is really an exciting file for me. This is a very easily customizable template that runs off of several modules that are all XML driven. Additional Features
  • Fullscreen Support
  • Fullscreen resizable background image
  • Background image and background color now XML controlled
  • Added an all-new traditional image/video gallery module
  • Integrated a new module called the Staff module
  • Improved transitions
  • Comes with 3 new sample background images. These are my renderings using 3ds Max. Special Characters àáâãäß é ê í ü.
Minor Enhancements
  • Improved help files and documentation
  • Footer text now allows CDATA, thus allowing special characters and links
  • Larger content area
  • Stage resize has a limitation of no less than 900x520
  • Updated fonts for improved legibility
  • Updated the preloaders

news.title: About this news module
news.info:
This news module is managed by XML and styled with CSS. This news module is categorized by year. You can add an unlimited amount of news items.
  • This text field is HTML-enabled so you can have lists like this
  • Scrollbars only appear when they're needed
  • That goes for the text field you're viewing here and also the news list to the left
    • This is an example of a link. Bold Text Italics Text Bold and Italics Text You can also load in images like this. I can also change the font color directly like this. Check out the other news examples to see how this thing runs. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Nullam auctor augue sed felis. Aliquam quis ipsum.
